title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Junior Ranger Activity Center
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Junior Ranger Activity Center              Junior Ranger Activity Center        The Junior Ranger Activity Center Located at 4th and Broadway NPS Photo         NPS Photo  The Nation's Only Junior Ranger Center Housed in a Historic Saloon!  A fun place for kids and for those young at heart.  The junior ranger center features animal furs, Victorian dress up clothes, Victorian games, coloring sheets, a reading area, historic artifacts, and lots of amazing history.  Use the provided iPads to complete the six activity stations and become a Junior Ranger.        NPS Photo  Come Join the Fun! The Junior Ranger Activity Center is open Mid-May to Mid September. Operating hours are Monday through Friday 10am to noon and 1pm to 3pm. The Center is located in the Historic Pantheon Saloon at 4th and Broadway in the historic district of Skagway
